name: Review Codebase
description: Examine the codebase for improvements and identify any potential issues.

name: Update Documentation
description: Ensure that the project documentation is up to date with recent changes.

name: Fix Login Bug
description: Resolve the issue preventing users from logging in to the system.

name: Optimize Database Queries
description: Improve the performance of database queries to reduce load time.

name: Design Landing Page
description: Create a visually appealing and functional landing page for the website.
